name: 曾恕銘
objective:
教學目標
本課程內容包含 I) 數位通訊系統，II) 行動通訊系統，III) 無線傳輸技術的基礎和最新發展 (CDMA/SCMA for 後 5G，資料偵測和干擾消除、MIMO、OFDMA，NOMA for 後 5G，混合波束成形 for 後 5G 毫米波巨量 MIMO)，使學生能閱讀理解通訊與訊號處理領域研究論文，並從事學位論文研究。
schedule:
內容、進度
Part I Digital Communication Systems
1.	Signals and linear systems
2.  Digital communications (including random processes, linear algebra)
Part II Mobile Communication Systems
3.	Mobile communication fundamentals (cellular system, propagation model, diversity)
Part III Wireless Transmissition Technology Fundamentals and Recent Advances
4.	CDMA/SCMA for B5G (new)
5.	Data detection/interference cancellation for CDMA etc.
6.	MIMO (Spatial Multiplexing/MU-MIMO/STBC/distributed STBC/beamforming) 
7.	OFDM (A) (principle/synchronization/channel estimation/power allocation)
8.	5G  key tech application scenerios and B5G  NOMA SCMA FD (new)
9. 	Hybrid beamforming for B5G mmWave massisive MIMO (new)
materials: 使用自編教材 / Use of self-made materials
